TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content:
6 more minutes till it uploads.

Oh, okay.

Based on that is one set of tanks intended for fuel and the other for the RCS?

It contains both a liquid and RCS tank. i will probably include an empty trunk. This is just more for fuel for docking and such if needed. At this stage in the game i am unsure of what i want. i am open to suggestions. I suppose now i will work on the engine are working since the trunk is done and entertaining detail wise

could you scale down the radial decoupler, the payload fairings, the 3m nosecone SAS, and the RCS, and make functioning saves, please?

I can\'t build these for the life of me.

Also, the second stage engine for the 1.5 meter engine is too weak.

could you scale down the radial decoupler, the payload fairings, the 3m nosecone SAS, and the RCS, and make functioning saves, please?

I can\'t build these for the life of me.

Also, the second stage engine for the 1.5 meter engine is too weak.

what are you trying to launch with it? i never had a problem. it is meant to have long burn periods for coolness effect. that is what it does IRL.

as for the other parts being scaled down I am not sure yet.

what are you trying to launch with it? i never had a problem. it is meant to have long burn periods for coolness effect. that is what it does IRL.

as for the other parts being scaled down I am not sure yet.

huh. the Q and E RCS key effects are broken again :/
I am so happy strut connectors were fixed as a result of my whining it even made it to space after an engine fell off i am impressed

after a nice orbit and some maneuvers in space with trunk attached and Asas on it was able to fly straight and retro burn with no problems. I a was able to land perfectly on land with no chutes. it is amazingly fun to fly.

I am so happy strut connectors were fixed as a result of my whining it even made it to space after an engine fell off i am impressed

Where are your solar panels 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8) 8)

it even made it to space after an engine fell off i am impressed

You see? As with the real thing, one engine out isn\'t a loss of mission
First rocket since the Saturn V to have full engine out capability, glad to see you\'re keeping it authentic!
I wish i knew why the engine fell off lol. It cleared the tower just fine.
Wobble/shear forces or a node collider overlapping?
I think perhaps the thrust vectored engine knocked it off or something lol.

do de do reoding a few fuel tank things. I fooudn the 2nd stage fuel tankw as to large and not all the fel was needed to get the thing into orbit. so i am changint heir size a bit. also I found the wlals were too thick so ia making them thinner. thy look nicer IMO.
